text: viśvāsavantayini! obaṭa punarjīvaya labā dīma desaṭa (dēva dūtayā vana) ohu, obava ārādhanā kaḷahot allāhṭada, (ohugē) dūtayāṭada piḷituru denu. niyata vaśayenma allāh minisunvada, ohugē hṛdayada vaṭakara gena ættēya yannada, niyata vaśayenma oba ohu vetama (gena enu læba) ēkarāśī karanu labannehuya yannada, oba sthīra vaśayen dæna ganu
